review_text:
This place is still your best deal for quality and delicious food. The Dreamport mall is very nice. It is a great place to watch a movie and eat a decent meal. We ate around 6 pm and walked right in. Usually there are long lines. While the service hasn't improved, the food is still up to par. I love...

Been in Beijjng for a week now and tried many different local restaurants. Stopped here for a quick lunch whilst visiting the shopping centre.
